verbs.description: as [V: costs] [ARG2: skyrocket] pennsylvania share of special education funding has fallen a report released by the education law center shows that while special education costs have been steadily climbing the amount of state funds allocated to districts for this purpose has been falling increasingly districts must raise the money from local tax revenue attorney lehigh valley griffin farrell dena farrell gober bethlehem education chief financial officer pa schools work parkland leigh rusnak director of business r - lehigh county catholic school john vignone bethlehem area school district stacy gober sen pat browne pat browne director pennsylvania school boards association special education gov tom wolf general assembly reynelle brown staley pennsylvania intermediate unit senator education law center east hills middle school
